activities: Collection and tracking of personal information about EU journalists, analysts and other media professionals for the purpose of providing public relations services to clients.  Collection and tracking of personal information about individuals employed by clients for the purpose of managing client accounts.  Collection and tracking of personal information about employees for the purpose of managing personnel and payroll.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: offline, online, manually processed data, human resources data
